Package it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configuration
    Application configuration singleton read from external file.

    Class Description
    AttackController
    Controller in charge of handling attacks.
    BoardController
    Controller in charge of handling the game board.

    Client specific configuration class
    Effect
    A weapons's effect.
    GameMap
    A game map.
    PlayerController
    Controller in charge of managing players.
    ServerConfig
    Server specific configuration class
    TurnController
    Controller in charge of handling a player's turn.

    Enumeration of player colors with their names.

    Enumeration of possible player statuses.

    Enumeration of square colors.
